body.name: Acrylic Cutting Boards For Kitchen Counter,Clear Chopping Board Non Slip Cutting Boards For Kitchen Cutting Board With Lip For Counter Countertop Protector Home Restaurant (Size : 18 X 16 Ins)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 16 hrs 37 mins
features: Cutting Board With Lip Edge: There is a protective film on both sides of the product. The protective film should be torn off when using for the first time.prepare food safely whilst protecting your countertops with our acrylic cutting board. Suitable for cutting fruit, vegetables, salad, cheese, meats, chocolate and more it is a must have piece for any kitchen due to its practicality and durability

Size Information: measuring 18 inches wide by 16 inches deep, there is a 1.2 inch lip on the longest edge to protect your work surfaces when preparing food. The lip sits neatly along the edge of your worktop making it easy to scrape peelings and other food debris directly off of the board into the trash

Clear Acrylic: countertops can be the focal point of the kitchen, especially when they’re beautifully patterned which is why we have designed our cutting board in a clear acrylic. When positioned on your work surface you can still see the countertop underneath, regardless of what you are cutting

Superior Protection: whether you’re peeling, chopping, dicing, slicing or grating, you can be safe in the knowledge that your marble, granite, wood or other material surface is protected from sharp knife blades. The lipped cutting board can also be used as a protector without any cutting, particularly ideal if you undertake craft projects in the kitchen or like to cook with ingredients that may color transfer and stain your surfaces such as beetroot or food coloring

Sturdy and Quality: the kitchen work surface with lip is made of quality acrylic, light in weight and not easy to break, not easy to deform and reusable, safe to use and long lasing to serve you for a long time
body.description: Note:There is a protective film on both sides of the acrylic cutting board, and the protective film needs to be torn off before use to show the transparency of the product.If you don't look carefully, you will not know that there is a protective film. You need to dig a few times at the corners to dig out the edge of the protective film. For detailed operations, please watch the video on our link.Instructions:1.Before the first use, clean the surface of the transparent cutting board with warm water and detergent to ensure that it is clean and hygienic.2.When in use, place the transparent cutting board on a stable surface and ensure that it is securely in contact with the tabletop or other supporting surface to avoid slipping.3.Our acrylic cutting board is made of food-grade acrylic material to ensure food safety. We recommend using the backing board we provide to avoid scratches during long-term use, prolong the service life of the acrylic cutting board, and make the acrylic cutting board always Keep it nice.4.The transparent cutting board has good wear resistance and corrosion resistance, but acrylic is not resistant to high temperatures and can only withstand temperatures below 185°F. Do not place it in a high-temperature environment to prevent deformation or discoloration. If the acrylic is exposed to a temperature between 140°F and 203°F for an extended period, it may experience slight deformation.5.After use, clean the surface of the transparent cutting board with warm water and detergent and wipe it dry with a soft cloth to prevent water droplets from remaining on the surface.Maintenance instructions:1.Avoid placing the transparent cutting board in a high-temperature environment, such as near a stove or in direct sunlight, to prevent deformation or discoloration.2.Avoid using cleaning agents containing abrasives or heavy solvents to clean the transparent cutting board, as

reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love my new cutting board, the anti-scratch mat is a life-saver!

This is for a gift so I haven't tested them yet but I opened to package to make sure everything looks okay. They are packaged well and there are no chips on any of the coasters. There are 2 of each slogan. The stand it comes with does NOT have non-slip feet but it is also sturdy and looks nice. I'm looking forward to giving this to my friend.Update: Friend loves them.

These are a huge conversation piece and everyone loves them! I got them so people would see them and clue in that i want them to use a coaster and it certainly works well for that! The only thing is, one slight bit of juice or something colorful and its stained. I wiped mine down minutes before spilling juice on it and it didnt come clean.I do have to say, i’m impressed with the quality. My cat dropped one off the table and the top part cracked completely in half. The bottom of the coaster (the soft part that sits on the table) stayed perfectly in tact so it was easy for me to super glue the two pieces back together. You cant even tell it was broken.

I bought this set for a housewarming gift, and now I'm jealous I didn't get myself one!! Not only is it hilarious,but its great quality and not cheap whatsoever. Super happy with this purchase.This is a great set, and I'm definitely going to order again for myself!!
These coasters are really cool but I found that if you get coffee on them they will stain and not come clean.
